organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: AMPR BRIGHTNESS TEMPERATURE CAMEX-2 V2
summary: The Advanced Microwave Precipitation Radiometer (AMPR) was deployed during the Convection and Moisture Experiment 2 (CAMEX-2). AMPR data were collected at a combination of frequencies (10.7, 19.35, 37.1, and 85.5 GHz) during the time period of August 23 - August 30, 1995. The geographic domain of the CAMEX-2 region was between 25.5 N - 43 N latitude and 83 W - 70 W longitude.
